scripts.debug: npm run make-client-config && npm run build --workspace=client && bash ../perennial-alias/bin/sage run --inspect src/server/app.ts
scripts.dev: npm run make-client-config && npm run lint && npm run type-check && concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=client" "npm run dev-node"
scripts.start: npm run make-client-config && npm run type-check && npm run build --workspace=client && npm run start-node
scripts.prod: npm run make-client-config && npm run build --workspace=client && npm run start-node
